authors: The community (Roll20,Reddit,Pinterest,ecc.) if with link put in the description of monster

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: The fiend ignores the range restriction on its telepathy when communicating with a creature it has {@condition charmed}. The two don't even need to be on the same plane of existence.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The fiend can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form.

Without wings, the fiend loses its flying speed. Other than its size and speed, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, Meridiana of Velvet Silk has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Meridiana of Velvet Silk scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Meridiana of Velvet Silk deals an extra 13 ({@damage 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the Meridiana of Velvet Silk that isn't incapacitated and Meridiana of Velvet Silk doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Claw (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Pain Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) piercing damage also on hit target makes a {@dc 12} Constitution save or gain weeknes against that attack.

action.name: Assassins Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) piercing damage. If target receives sneak attack damage you add {@damage 1d4} damage.

action.name: Throwing Knives of Debilitation
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) piercing damage also on hit target makes a {@dc 15} Constitution save or become {@condition stunned} until beginnig of their next turn.

action.name: Charm
entries: One humanoid the fiend can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} for 1 day. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the fiend's verbal or telepathic commands. If the target suffers any harm or receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. If the target successfully saves against the effect, or if the effect on it ends, the target is immune to this fiend's Charm for the next 24 hours. The fiend can have only one target {@condition charmed} at a time. If it charms another, the effect on the previous target ends.

action.name: Draining Kiss
entries: The fiend kisses a creature {@condition charmed} by it or a willing creature. The target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 32 ({@damage 5d10 + 5}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a success full one. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The fiend magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.
